title: The 100 Curses of the Illeston Mansion
summary:
**Even if it’s a cursed mansion, it’s the only place for me to live!**

As if being reincarnated into a generic fantasy webtoon wasn’t enough, I have to be the ‘Necromancer’ who is sacrificed for the protagonist...

Since it has come to this, it can’t be helped. Even if I can’t become a rich noble lady from a romance fantasy, I want to at least protect my life and live comfortably.

Let’s go to that place, the one full of curses and ghost stories. To the mansion of the villain, Archduke Illestone!

**"I will break the curse on this mansion for you, In return, please raise me."**

(Source: MangaUpdates, edited)

title: The Villanins Favorite Is Me
summary:
Despite being from a prestigious noble family, Bridget, a failed daughter who made a contract with the weakest spirit, one day had her engagement broken off by the third prince, Joseph.

However, no one sympathized with her, who was acting as a proud daughter at the behest of Joseph... At that time, Bridget meets the Duke's son Yuri, who is feared by those around him because of his overwhelming ability and cold personality.

Two people who hate each other and repel each other. However, the encounter gradually changes their destinies. This is the story of a villainess who is despised for being incompetent and a villain who is shunned for being a genius who eventually fall in love.

---
Despite her noble status, Brigitte contracts with the weakest type of spirit—and on that very same day, the prince publicly breaks off their engagement. No one shows much sympathy towards the once haughty young lady—except for the duke's son, Yuri, who attends the same magic academy. Yuri is feared for his incredible abilities and icy personality, but with him on her side, her fortunes might have changed…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426830814673), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9923hb/)

title: When My Enemy Tempts Me
summary:
Guided by the goddess of love, Alice and Ethan from opposing countries fell in love, but with it came hatred, curses, and conspiracies...


Adapted from [the novel of the same name](https://www.webnovel.com/book/loving-the-forbidden-prince_19714572005006305).

title: The Hated Noble Lady, Yet in a Contract Marriage with the First Prince?!
summary: No summary available.

title: Oppa, That Must Be A Mistake!
The Extra Guardian Missed the Right Time to Leave
summary:
I was supposed to have died in an accident… but when I opened my eyes, I found myself inside the pages of my favorite novel!
And the worst part? I wasn’t reborn as the heroine or even the villainess… but as a completely insignificant side character.

According to the original story, the noble couple I work for will soon disappear, and all the servants will be dismissed afterward.
I knew exactly how it was going to play out, so I told myself:
“I’ll just live quietly, freely, and comfortably in my own way.”

But things didn’t go as planned…

Suddenly, and completely against the original plot, I find myself in charge of the marquess’s children, who were left behind after the tragic accident.
I’ve become their guardian, even though I was never meant to play this role!

Even when I tried to walk away, I couldn’t ignore their innocent eyes and their need for comfort…
So I chose to take on the responsibility, leading them on a journey filled with surprises and challenges.

title: I Became a Fallen Saint Pregnant With a Tyrant
The Unfortunate Bride Is Abducted by the Charming Dragon King
When a Genius Office Worker Goes Too Far
summary:
A genius marketer from Korea’s top film company, the only employee ever to fail peer evaluations, and the company’s public enemy number one for being caught up in a bribery scandal.

These labels sum up Han-rok’s life as a corporate employee. All he ever wanted was to focus on his work. 

But his refusal to play politics or suck up to anyone his decision to avoid aligning with any faction - came back to bite him in the form of betrayal and false accusations.

Just when he hit rock bottom, He found himself back on that day, five years ago, when everything began to unravel.

Determined never to be a victim again, Han-rok starts to cross the line. And for the first time, He begins to see the threads of the real problem that had always been hidden.

title: The Regressed Mercenary’s Machinations
summary:
Cecil Perdium, the Mercenary King, was killed in battle before he could avenge his family. As he faces death, he learns that Duke Delphine, the man who caused the downfall of his family, didn't work alone. 

Suddenly waking up as his teenage self, Cecil must work to both overcome his poor reputation and build up his strength to save his family. With their soldiers and knights defecting due to the harsh conditions they must endure, he has his work cut out for him. 

Can Cecil become the mighty warrior he once was and avert his family's fate?

title: ‏I Will Fall With The Emperor
summary:
"There can only be one sun."
"Two suns will only burn and kill the empire's people."

Alexar, the great wizard who commanded the empire, after being betrayed by his close friend Gillian Terzios who he trusted and followed, was reborn again as a master swordsman on the outskirts of a small country.

Alexar, the great wizard, moves to seek revenge on Gillian, his close friend and the only nine-star prosecutor of the continent.

title: Legend of Star General
summary: A spinoff centering on Lu Bu Fengxian.

title: Mia is Back
summary:
Five years ago, my first love, Cha Mia, disappeared. Now, she has reappeared before me, completely changed.
An unexpected reunion at the police station… and she turns out to be a freshman at the same university?

The story of two people who thought it was over begins again on campus... or so I thought, but she still insists on letting the past go.

title: The Delivery Man From Murim
summary: Stranded in a new world, Smiley Kang covertly lives the life of a delivery man. Until now, humanity has fended off demonic beasts and their portal “gates.” There are the Awakened, citizens imbued with supernatural abilities, and there are those more scheming, fighting to monopolize and claim demonic resources. But as the number of gates starts to rise, the world is at risk once again. Can humanity survive another onslaught of demonic beasts? The answer lies with the mysterious delivery man…

title: Healing Life Through Camping In Another World
summary: Star chef Ganghyeon Lee, who has lost his sense of taste, retreats to a peaceful countryside to escape the public eye. In his grandfather's rural home, he stumbles upon a portal to another world. Taking advantage of his escape, he decides to enjoy a relaxed camping life in this new world. However, the inhabitants of this world keep showing interest in him. Will Ganghyeon be able to live a peaceful life?

title: What a Bountiful Harvest, Demon Lord!
summary: Who was that guy that once said, “***An army marches on its stomach**”? When hapless agricultural science student *Jangcheol Kim* starts playing the fantasy MMORPG “**Paladins of Blood**” to escape the stress of school life, he never imagined he would end up inside the game, much less as its final boss. How can a ruthless demon overlord win over his subjects? Perhaps with potatoes.

title: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago
summary: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

title: Doctor Resignation
summary: When the duke, who was in poor condition, suddenly died, the land fell into the hands of the rebels. In a short time, the rebellion was suppressed by the royal family, but… The point is that I, Lise Estelle, will be hanged for treason. “It’s not fair!” I’m simply the best doctor in the area. If that’s the case, I’ll become the duke’s doctor this time so there’s no rebellion, and I’ll make the duke’s heir healthy! “No one cares about you as much as I do. Therefore, you must definitely listen to me !

title: The Knight King Who Returned with a God
summary:
I returned to Earth after hunting demons in the otherworld for three hundred years. However, I did not return alone.

**Official Translations**
[Simplified Chinese](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/yushentongguideqishiwang/list?title_no=2594) 
[Traditional Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/the-king-of-knights-returns-with-god/list?title_no=5491)

title: I Killed an Academy Player
summary:
Being a character of your favorite game is great! Sure, he’s just a minor NPC, but Corin knows this game like the back of his hand. With his knowledge and the main player Sihu’s abilities, everything’s going smoothly - until Corin discovers Sihu’s been murdering innocent NPCs and stealing their items. 

Horrified but powerless to stop him, Corin awaits the end of the game - only for Sihu to mysteriously fail at the last mission. 

Instantly, Corin travels three years back in time. Now, he’s determined to kill Sihu and take on his role - defeat the final boss and save the world.

title: The Purpose of Marriage
summary: No summary available.

title: There’s No Such Thing as a Bad Hero in the World
summary:
<You have obtained the skill [Precious Child Status Notification]! You can now more accurately assess the condition of the child who needs your help.>

Edith Irene Bruxelles had one secret: she had experienced possession.

One day, out of nowhere, she became Edith. Not only that, she was in a completely different era, in a strange country she had never heard of before!

And, on top of that, she had an unusual ability that others couldn't see.

To return to her original life, Edith chose to enter into a contractual marriage with a genius sorcerer Duke.

"Will you marry me?"
"Yes! I’d love to!"

However...

"What’s going on? Do you really think you’re the Duchess of the Duke’s family?"
"Bruxelles? Has anyone even heard of that family?"

The nobles reject her because she comes from a fallen family.

"Actually, this is great!"

She thinks positively and goes about her life, but she keeps running into children who are struggling behind the social scenes.

<Stress: 130/100 [Danger!!]>
[Appropriate action for the Precious Child is required.]

"Miss, could you please hold the child's hand?"

Unable to watch any longer, she steps in, and before she knows it, she becomes known as the "fixer."

"Duchess, I was hoping we could meet privately next week."
"I’d like that too. Would you be able to come to our residence?"

The story of how I, once an outcast in high society, became the top invitee.

Finally adjusting to the changed atmosphere, now her husband is acting strangely.

"Is that something you normally say you like?"
"Well, I guess so?"
"If that's the case, then what I like is you."

Oh my, who in the world confesses like that!?

(Source: Kakao Page, edited)

title: The Blackened Second Male Lead’s Wife Series
summary:
Lucian Kardien. He was the hero who led the war to victory. He was the second male lead who loved the female lead so much that he turned yandere. And I’m the fiancée who will be killed by his hand.

Of all things, why did I have to transmigrate here! I must somehow increase his likability to prevent a “surprise” ending. With a toothy grin and my clapping hands of approval, I’ll help him connect with the female lead! But what is this reaction?

“Lady Pernia… please don’t provoke me anymore.”

…Why is it still a scary ending!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%9D%91%ED%99%94%ED%95%98%EB%8A%94-%EC%84%9C%EB%B8%8C-%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%98-%EC%95%84%EB%82%B4%EB%9E%8D%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3567), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/62102395)

title: Bullshit
summary:
When CEO Jung Taeon mentioned he would stay for a month at Yeonghwadang, Sahee didn’t think much of it. He was merely a valued guest who would never get involved with someone as insignificant as her. However, the rude and endlessly arrogant man had a different perspective.

“Yeon Sahee, why don’t we sleep together?”

Sahee felt a mix of discomfort and unease, but his unpredictable demeanor continues to unsettle her..

title: I’m a Solo Guide
summary:
"It's safe because it's a desk job, super stable because it's public work!"

Alina Clover thought being a receptionist for the Adventurers Guild would be her ticket to the good life... but her dream gig turns into an overtime nightmare whenever adventurers get stuck clearing a dungeon. To save herself from paperwork, Alina turns to the simplest solution at hand — beating down the monsters herself! A mysterious adventurer showing up out of nowhere, soloing the boss, then disappearing without taking credit is bound to create rumors, and Alina's treasured job forbids side hustles. So there might be trouble when the leader of the Silver Sword party discovers her secret...!

title: Marronnier Farm Near By The Imperial Palace
summary:
When Hazel Mayfield is sent to live with the Martins as a child, she falls in love with rural life and vows to have a farm of her own one day. Eleven years later, she receives an unexpected windfall as her grandfather hands her the deed to a plot of land in the middle of the capital. Ecstatic, Hazel sets out to realize her longtime dream of becoming a farmer. There’s only one problem: Her new farm is right next to the imperial palace! And it seems the emperor himself has his eye on her land…

[Officia Indonesian version](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/My-Farm-by-the-Palace/549)
[Official Japanese version](https://piccoma.com/web/product/108482)
[Official Korean version - Kakao](https://page.kakao.com/content/59250857)
[Official Korean version - Daum](https://page.kakao.com/content/59250857)

title: The Little Lord Who Makes Flowers Bloom
summary:
"Gloriosa... You ugly thing that can't even bloom a single petal, you'd make perfect food for the trees-."

I was one of thirty-seven children of the Elvador family of the Flower People, and I was sacrificed to the tree that was the foundation of my family. Then, with the help of my betrothed, Arvid, my family was destroyed and I was only saved by my death.

When I woke up, I was transported back in time...? Do I have to relive my horrible past all over again? I wasn’t even saved by dying?! ...If I have to start all over again, I'll save myself in this life-! This is Gloriosa's intense and endearing redemption.

---
Gloriosa Elvador can bloom flowers that produce harmless flames, but her evil brother, Magnus, deems her power worthless and feeds her to the sacred tree. Although she's resigned to die, she reawakens in the past as her 13-year-old self with a second chance at life. Now, she must find her cursed betrothed, Arvid Yultecia. Only he can save her from dying again, and only she can lift his curse. Will their blooming love be enough to save them both, or will Magnus trample their budding romance?

title: Cry, Even Better If You Beg
My Husband Married My Stepmother
summary: Leia, the daughter of the Sharon family, is secretly in love with Thomas, a commoner who is her butler. However, when her father commits suicide, leaving her with a large debt, she is forced into a political marriage with a young nobleman. Her husband is surprisingly kind, but just as she begins to feel positive about married life, she hears an older woman's moans coming from his room...!

title: I Thought It’s a Common Possession
summary:
I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?

---
Not all villains are evil. When Suna Choi reincarnates as Edith Rigelhof, the villain from her favorite novel, she is determined to change Edith’s life around and treats everyone with kindness. Although she marries the handsome Killian Rudwick, he is madly in love with the original protagonist of the book and mistrusts Edith because she is from a rival family. Will her marriage survive the whirlwind of family feuds, love triangles, and more? Will Edith find her happy ending?

title: The Reincarnation of the Duke’s Daughter
summary: A humble man in his thirties suddenly dies and is reborn as the daughter of a duke in an 18th-century lookalike world where magic exists! He is now living a second life as the adorable "Miranda Mirandiehl," who looks like a doll. As he was always a "girl inside" with girlish interests, he accepted his reincarnation surprisingly easily. And so, after being reborn as Miranda, he will enjoy his new life to the fullest! What kind of encounters await him, and what lies ahead in his gender-swapped otherworldly reincarnation life?

title: Surviving The Game as a Barbarian
summary:
After spending nine years on Dungeon and Stone, the role-playing game that no player has ever beaten, Lee Hansoo finally reaches the dungeon of the final boss.

As soon as he opens the gate, however, he suddenly sees a message that says his tutorial has been completed and finds himself in the body of Bjorn Yandel, a real barbarian within the game.

An exciting adventure awaits him as he endeavors to abide by the laws of the fictional world!

----
[Additional Official English translation (Tappytoon)](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/surviving-the-game-as-a-barbarian)

title: The Nebula’s Civilization
summary: Seong-un Choi is the top-ranked player in the game “Lost World,” being the only player to have completed all its achievements. However, his triumph is short-lived as a mysterious message transports him to the real “Lost World,” transforming him from a mere gamer to a contender for godhood. Amidst others vying for divinity, will Seong-un be able to achieve true godhood and reign supreme in this new realm?

title: That summers promise once again
summary: Minami is now one of the most popular young actresses, rising to the top with her natural beauty and charm. However, there's one thing that continues to trouble her. Back in middle school, she was in a serious traffic accident that left her severely injured and took a full year to recover from. As a result of the accident, she also lost all memories related to it. Since then, she has been having the same dream every single night. In that dream, someone gently whispers to her: "Don’t forget the promise we made that summer…

title: I Tamed the Enemy Prince
summary: After losing his life in an accident, Kazuma finds himself reincarnated as the Ascalon Empire's third prince, Ares.  He wasn't born with the "stigmata", the proof that one is royalty and gives them extraordinary abilities, however, he still received love from his family and spent his days in peace. Until one day, his father's first wife, Germa barged into their home, and looked at Ares in contempt for not having a stigmata. In the end, she even put his mother, Erina in danger. Realizing how powerless he truly was, Ares decided to protect his family with his own power. He decides to enroll into Ascalon Academy, a prestigious school where one's capability decides everything!

title: The World After The Fall
summary:
An adventurer named Ed was exiled from his party because he was considered useless, but instead of being sad and upset he was actually happy!!? It turns out that it's not without reason that he feels happy when he's exiled from his party, because every time he's been exiled he will receive a skill that makes him even more invincible…

Ed was given the crazy test of having to get expelled from 100 Hero parties in 100 different worlds before he could return to his original world. Finally a mysterious and divine entity said that he had achieved all the conditions to return to his original world. However, as a final condition he is asked “Look at the fate of one of these exile worlds after you left.” and he is shocked by what he sees.

“Okay, I'll do it! I'll go down to these 100 worlds again and be banished with a good feeling!”

Ed takes on a new challenge to make full use of the super-powerful “Exiled Skills” that were granted each time he was exiled, and this time ensure they all have happy endings.
___
**Character Designer:** [GreeN](https://mangadex.org/author/40916d07-ed66-40d9-919f-3bfff091fe9a)

title: The Zenith
summary: Yangcheon Ku, born to the virtuous House of Ku of Sanseo, the Little Star and next Head of House. Status: The world’s most hated demonic martial artist. Cause of death: Defeated during the Virtuous-Demonic War, tortured upon capture. Or so he thought. Moments after dying in the arms of his childhood friend, the Heavenly Sword herself, Seol-ah Wi, he finds himself back in the past. Already things have changed, but is it enough to ensure his second chance at life doesn’t end with the same regrets?

title: How Far Are You Okay With?
summary: “If it’s okay with you, Noona… Do you want to do that thing I just saw with me?” Eunpyeong finds it difficult to start dating because of painful memories. Nyuk, her underclassman from the same department, approaches her but Eunpyeong finds it hard to accept him. One day, Nyuk walks Eunpyeong home because she is drunk. At her house, he makes an unexpected discovery and a bold suggestion…

title: My Beloved Oppressor
summary: Annette Rosenberg, a descendant of the Padanian royal family and the only daughter of a military captain. After two years of dating, she married her father’s faithful servant, Heiner Valdemar. Everything was perfect. Until her family fell due to her husband’s betrayal. “You will be unhappy by my side for the rest of your life.” Annette suddenly realized something. This man’s revenge is just beginning.

title: The Male Lead Is Unhealthily Obsessed With My Health
summary:
I was reincarnated as an extra, the non-existent childhood friend of the male lead, who dies early in the novel. I can’t even avoid the time limit dead flag. That’s why I was living like this…

 “Why aren’t you healthy?” 

“I’m healthy.”

 “Why are you sick again? Did I allow you to be sick?” 

The male lead became obsessed with my health. Oh, please, can someone get rid of this guy! — I was definitely reincarnated as an extra with no presence. But my new life is unfolding strangely. 

“Why are you doing this for me?”

 “Because I like you.” 

Suddenly the sunny male lead started sticking to me.. 

“Mom, do it for me.”

 “I’m a man.”

And a handsome guardian who became my mother (gender: male)…

 “Hello, daughter!” 

Even a dad who was supposed to die appeared before me… Also.. 

“From today on, I’m your dad.”

 A suspicious human was aiming to become my dad. Why did I put myself in this undeserved situation as an extra? Can I really become healthy?

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Confessing My Love to Him, the Treacherous One
summary: When Natalie went back in time after her death, her only desire was for revenge. Instead, she accidentally confessed to the most dangerous man in the empire?! Natalie, the only daughter of the Count, was tricked by her stepmother and stepsister into marrying an abusive scumbag before dying tragically. After going back in time, she decided to turn her back against them and prepared to interfere with her stepsister’s love for the young master of the Duke’s mansion, Eli. But what she didn’t expect was for an accident to occur, and she ended up confessing to his uncle instead?! Help, this man is notorious for being difficult to deal with! Is it too late now to withdraw the confession?

title: When the Black Wolf Calls Me
summary:
"You can never have me. The one who can kill me, is me, not you."

Yeonwoo killed herself in front of her ex-husband who murdered her family. Yet, she found herself back again.

To escape from my ex-husband Hyojo's obsession, to protect my family and to protect myself... I ask another man to take me.

"Hwita, I'll be your woman!"

title: The End of an Imperfect Divorce
Return From The Abyss
summary: One day, an ordinary high school student is transferred to another world. He raises his level in the other world, successfully defeats the Demon King, and saves the world! With his strongest status, he decided to return to his own world; however, in the world to which he returns, a new "dungeon" has appeared.

title: I Became a Swordsmanship Instructor at the Academy
summary:
The protagonist is reincarnated in the body of Kang Shin-hyuk, a background character from a popular novel. Shin-hyuk decides to leave saving the world to the original protagonists and enjoy a wealthy, carefree life without interfering with the novel’s plot. 

However, he discovers discrimination against non-Hunter school graduates at the school where he works. 

To avoid being looked down upon by his fellow teachers, and to lead a comfortable life, Ayumu begins his reincarnation journey, determined to become strong enough to protect himself… even if it means slightly altering the original story.

title: The Delusional Hunter in Another
summary:
"I have a little secret. I'm from an alien planet far, far away.

However... fate had other plans. I found myself reincarnated into the body of someone who had literally starved to death! Will Gi-ryeo be able to find a way to adapt to this strange planet called Earth and keep his true identity hidden?"

title: Even Today, the Ranker Dreams of Retirement
summary:
Hyun Ha-bin, find the power to turn back time to rescue her brother from doom.

However, fate has different plans: she’s now the reluctant vessel of a godlike constellation begging her to destroy the world.

While she just wants to stay with her family and live life, S-rank hunters swarm her for its power!

title: Nano Machine
summary:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.  

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_t397hfZC3w)
---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000948)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2171)

title: There Is No Need To Be Obsessed
